# `clear` for [platform](/commands/categories/platform.md)

<div class='command-title'>Clear the terminal.</div>

## Signature

```> clear {flags} ```

## Flags

 -  `--all, -a`: Clear the terminal and its scroll-back history


## Input/output types:

| input   | output  |
| ------- | ------- |
| nothing | nothing |

## Examples

Clear the terminal
```nu
> clear

```

Clear the terminal and its scroll-back history
```nu
> clear --all

```
